dpm.lejos.project

Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • dpm.lejos.project.Navigation

  • public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides all the necessary navigation capabilities All motion is managed by this class
    Version:
    1.5
    Author:
    David Lavoie-Boutin

        Converts a set of coordinates in a vector displacement with orientation and magnitude
        Parameters:
